Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conflict, Comparable<Course>
public class Course extends Activity implements Comparable<Course>
A class that represents a course at NCSU with a name, title, section number, credits, instructorID, meetingDays, startTime, and endTime. It contains all the necessary getters and setters for its fields as well as overriding hash code, equals, and to string to fit the project description. In addition methods getShortDisplayArray and getLongDisplayArray are included to output some or all of the contents of this class to a GUI. This class is a subclass of Activity.
Author:
Cole Sanders

    • getLongDisplayArray

      public String[] getLongDisplayArray()
      Creates a longer string array listing the course's name, section, title, credits, instructorId, meeting string, and an empty string that will be used in the Event class. Overrides getLongDisplayArray in Activity class because some course specific fields need to be displayed.
      Specified by:
      getLongDisplayArray in class Activity
      Returns:
      an array string listing all the course details plus an empty string

    • setMeetingDaysAndTime

      public void setMeetingDaysAndTime(String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Sets the meeting days, start times, and end times of an event. If meetingDays is null, an empty string or if the days are not non repeating valid characters, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Overrides Activity setMeetingDaysAndTime because valid course meeting days are different from valid event meeting days.
      Overrides:
      setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
      Parameters:
      meetingDays - the days the course meets
      startTime - the time the course meets
      endTime - the time the course ends
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are invalid

    • isDuplicate

      public boolean isDuplicate(Activity activity)
      Compares if two courses are duplicates. Overrides the Activity isDuplicate method to check for duplicates between two courses specifically.
      Specified by:
      isDuplicate in class Activity
      Parameters:
      activity - potential duplicate course
      Returns:
      true if the courses have the same name, otherwise false

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Course c)
      Orders current instance of Course against passed in Course c. Ordering is done based on name and then section.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Course>
      Parameters:
      c - course ordering is checked against
      Returns:
      -1 if current instance of Course is less than passed in instance, 0 if equal, and 1 if greater than.
